Relationship between accessories and monsters

By Lunaron on Saturday, September 18, 2010 - 02:37 am:

i have some questions 1. how many ''antenae'' are there ? 2. can a monster increase in stats with an accessory? 3. do monsters find accessories with the odds being different depending on the breed/spiecies or individual, or is it all the same? 4. is it possible to all accessories possible for each monster? 5. if i (FOR EXAMPLE)were to search for an accessory with beaklon such as antenae#1 will i find it with luck randomly with warrabi or is it based on chance by odds? 6. are hiddensecret accessories rare

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, September 18, 2010 - 04:31 pm:

I am replying to mostly keep this bumped. My book is packed in anticipation of moving in a few weeks, so I can't answer most of your questions.

I don't know what hidden secret acc are.

4) You left a word out. You cannot equip every monster with all their acc because some have more than one of each type.
